articles.title: 'American Idol' crowns Jamal Roberts its season 23 winner, Jessica Simpson performs in finale - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: 'American Idol' has crowned a new victor... Mississippi P.E. teacher Jamal Roberts: 'I’m so grateful for every person who believed in me when I was just chasing a dream.'
articles.content:
American Idol has crowned its newest winner.
During Sunday's live finale, three contestants took the stage to deliver their final performances of the season and make their last bid to be crowned the… [+3525 chars]
